name: [DEMO] Protect Santa
description:
Play as a teddy bear and attack the snowmen so Santa can deliver his presents to the Orphans under the Christmas tree.

Uses mouse to click on snowmen and to move.  You can also move using arrow keys

The mechanic is to try and do a Tower Defense using RPG in a Box

Uploading now as I know I wont finish it before Christmas.

Please let a comment if you want me to continue this project or if you want me to generate a linux\MacOS version.

Bugs: - This is a demo so expect there to be plenty.

Credits to : https://theodd1in.itch.io/xmas for the Trees/Snowman/Presents

My first attempt at using RPG in a Box

My 9 year old made the Elf

I created everything else

Sounds from a Humble Bundle I brought ages ago.
